title: Domestic Worker (Temporary) Diplomatic and Consular visa (subclass 426)
summary: This page provides information for current holders of the Domestic Worker (Temporary) Diplomatic and Consular visa (subclass 426), which closed to new applications on 24 November 2012. It explains visa validity, rights, obligations, and responsibilities for both visa holders and sponsors. It also outlines what changes must be reported to authorities.

visa_details.visa_name: Domestic Worker (Temporary) Diplomatic and Consular visa
visa_details.applicability: Information provided is for people already granted this visa.

what_visa_lets_you_do: work in domestic duties in the household of a Diplomatic (Temporary) visa (subclass 995) holder
enter and leave Australia while the visa is valid

visa_duration.duration_description: Visa length depends on the circumstances of the visa holder and employer.
visa_duration.maximum_duration_limit: Cannot exceed length of employerâ€™s diplomatic posting.

general_obligations: comply with all visa conditions and Australian laws
continue to meet requirements of the granted visa stream
meet Australian taxation obligations if working in Australia
specific_restrictions: work only in the household of the employer
not work for another person or for yourself
not stay in Australia if the employer leaves permanently unless approved by the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade
seek agreement from the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade to transfer employment and enter a new employment agreement in another diplomatic household

requirements: provide at least minimum standards for wages and working conditions under Australian law
ensure the visa holder leaves Australia when the visa ends or the job finishes
pay the cost of travel for the visa holder to return to their home country

must_notify_changes: change to phone number, email, address, or passport
notification_requirements.consequences_of_not_reporting_passport_c: May experience significant delays at the airport and may be denied permission to board a plane.

additional_information.vevo_availability: Visa Entitlement Verification Online (VEVO) can be used for free to check visa details and entitlements.
